channel.title: Xp guide is now up
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Xp guide is now up" - I made the XP guide finally

item.title: Re: Xp guide is now up
item.content:encoded: i will add both of those to the guide later today when i get back from my parents house.

item.title: Re: Xp guide is now up
item.content:encoded: The stamina cost for getting a note rush should be factored in. I believe it is 30 since there is a 20 stamina bonus from the trade when you bingo someone.

item.title: Re: Xp guide is now up
item.content:encoded: If you got the S-Mission drops (Season 2+), you get +20 Stamina for haveing Emosuke/Pinky/Stalkergirl in your party overnight.

item.title: Re: Xp guide is now up
item.content:encoded:
Doesn't it cost 100 per use? And it is what 1/2 chakra back per charge (village bonus is +50chakra)?

So I also dont forget:
Jutsu Enhancement Tower Enhance your Jutsus to cost less Chakra (Obsessive Insight costs 600k jxp to get to lower is once)
Chakra Training Center 10% less Chakra costs
Sand Demon Monument 1 Stamina back per mission

Hopefully more contributions to come :D

item.title: Re: Xp guide is now up
item.content:encoded:
Hanging out with annoymous if possible would reduce the factor of having to recharge for charka for his justu.
You could just use a Make-Out Mood Enhancer instead of a potion so you can savor some stamnia.
Every Nine missions = a recharge doesn't it?

item.title: Re: Xp guide is now up
item.content:encoded: i'll fix that in the morning and when i get some more clarifications on the stamina and other bonuses and other tips from people. I know i want to add in the whole +100,000 daily xp potion thing and when it is a good time to use it

item.title: Re: Xp guide is now up
item.content:encoded: minor note legacy bonus stamina was nerfed to 45. 60 is now only for sannin.

item.title: Xp guide is now up
item.content:encoded:
I made the XP guide. It can be found at guide xp.

Any suggestions/additions/remarks are greatly appreciated.

Enjoy!

Additions noted to be done:
Legacy Bonus Stamina is 45 not 60
Use Make-Out Mood Enhancer instead of +stamina potion/XP potion to hang out with Anon
Add how often you need to recharge chakra to spam Obsessive Insight.
Add potion Silver Elixir +100,000 Daily XP Ranking and why you would use it
Section on why someone would hang out with Anon
Having LisaLisa or V-day allies in party overnight for bonuses
Use of hanging out with someone by friend points on the day of your attempt (Glowing Mood Ring or Silver Hairpin)

More contributorsto add: naito
